channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Chicago churches urge calm resistance ahead of expected federal intervention
item.description: As Chicago braces for an influx of federal immigration agents and possibly National Guard troops, churches citywide are turning up their response from the pulpit.

item.title: Florida’s plan to drop school vaccine rule won’t start for 90 days, won’t cover all diseases
Black man shot at while waiting to go to work says South Carolina needs hate crime law
